name: Duality Pumpkin!
description:
Control: arrows (up, left, right, down)

One day I opened a volume of old fairy tales..

The stories were mysterious and mystical..

I'll tell you one of those stories..

Ancient creatures, or as we say, gods, are not always friendly and fair.. Cruel brothers like the black and white moons emptied the graves for their experiments. In carrying out their necromantic designs, they became less cautious. The pumpkin-hero, personifying the triumph and tranquility of the dead, will not let them do evil.                      

And you are a reader? Can you help a pumpkin?

Game for Global Game Jam UA 2022

  

                  

https://hedgewizard.bandcamp.com/album/more-true-than-time-thought
